plot: This new twist on the ever-popular matchmaking format takes the notion of "blind date" to its literal extreme as Aussie guys and girls have various liaisons in pitch-black conditions over several days.
plot_en: This new twist on the ever-popular matchmaking format takes the notion of "blind date" to its literal extreme as Aussie guys and girls have various liaisons in pitch-black conditions over several days.
plot_es: This new twist on the ever-popular matchmaking format takes the notion of "blind date" to its literal extreme as Aussie guys and girls have various liaisons in pitch-black conditions over several days.
title: Dating in the Dark
